nodes.bodyText: Can we put core tests in their own stage? I think this will help us view its stability and potentially replace the itests only stage in the future. @pklinef thoughts?
That would be very helpful for the reasons you gave as long as it does not add too much overhead.
Do you know how long it is taking the core tests to run? If it is less than an hour I like setting the timeout to 1 hour to keep a standard of not making exceed an hour.
Core tests run under 10-15 mins, I set timeout to one hour for ITests and Core tests
